attributes.action: allow 1 man and 1 woman to form there own marriage free from state/church control
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: under article 16 of the human rights act, we are given the right to form our own marriages free from control, by church/state. as marriage is a covenant witnessed by GOD, and no other, as a christian I want my right to form a common law marriage to be protected under law, by repealing the hardwicke act
